description: This Java class implements an in-memory repository for Note objects, providing basic CRUD operations such as save, findById, findAll, deleteById, and existsById. It is annotated as a Spring @Repository component and uses a ConcurrentHashMap to store data.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe, in-memory implementation of the NoteRepository interface for storing notes during development.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Stores or updates a Note in the in-memory store.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Retrieves a Note by its UUID, returning an Optional<Note>.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Returns a list of all stored notes.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Removes the Note with the specified UUID from the store.

methods.name: existsById
methods.description: Checks whether a Note with the specified UUID exists in the store.
